casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Lee TROXLER. No. 58PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2004. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Troxler. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of May 2004 by Attorney General to Extend Time to File State's New Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 25th day of May 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of May 2004."
